info.name: Ludo Game API - Complete Collection v3.0
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for the Ludo multiplayer game platform including all endpoints with enhanced parameters, optional fields, and comprehensive testing. This collection includes complete payloads for all endpoints with optional fields clearly identified. Key features: Authentication & User Management, Game Management, Tournament System, Wallet & Payments, Chat System, Leaderboards, and Admin Functions. All request bodies include both required and optional fields for maximum functionality.

exec: // Fields marked with (OPTIONAL) in request bodies are not required for basic functionality
// but provide enhanced features when included. These include:
// - deviceInfo: Device information for analytics and debugging
// - metadata: Additional context and tracking information
pm.test('Response time is less than 5000ms', function () {
pm.test('Response has valid JSON body', function () {
